name: OpGen Media
description:
OpGen Media is an outsourced demand generation partner to B2B companies ranging from SMBs to Enterprise. 
For Enterprise clients such as Oracle, DocuSign, Opentext and more, our core focus is on acquiring net new prospects on a performance model.
For our SMB clients, we are an outsourced demand generation partner that builds, optimizes and scales core revenue driving components such as marketing automation, outbound marketing, SEO and more. We are your outsourced, fully functional, VP of Demand Generation that owns a lead and revenue commit.
